data.actual_result: The DM disappears from the sidebar. But: When you go to the previously marked as unread DM, the message is still unread.
data.expected_result: The sidebar should still have the DM with an unread message in it.
data.short_description: Manually "marked-as-unread" DMs disappear after reloading the client.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an already read DM - With ALT pressed, click on any message (of your chat partner) that the chat is being marked as unread and the users avatar pops up in the sidebar again - Reload your client with Ctrl+R/CMD+R
